name: Red or Blue Pill
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 157. The theme for the jam was "Vulnerable Invincible". From this, we decided to make a platformer where there are two mode, Red or Blue. When you are in one of the modes, you can only interact with objects that are the same color. There is a timer for each level that switches you in between modes.

Controls:

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Space to Jump

Press Space while on wall to do wall jump
